thread.title: In the lion's den: The Indian women who answer cat calls
thread.title_full: In the lion's den: The Indian women who answer cat calls

author: Lyzza
title: In the lion's den: The Indian women who answer cat calls
text: Location: Stage Left Posts: 1,524 I know, that job would be so cool! I love big cats too, but I bet most people probably do. Did you see the story from the first lady interviewed in that piece? The one where she was lowered in a cage with a tranquilizer gun, had to wait for the trapped and very pissed leopard to get into the cage with her and then shoot it and hope to hell that is a fast acting tranquilizer!!!! Talk about balls I will never understand trophy hunting. It is a bunch of bullshit, period. If you kill an animal, you better be willing to make the most use out of it possible. And, it better be for a damn good reason. Trophies are NOT a damn good reason.
